DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effectiveness iron treatment iron deficiency pregnant 2nd 3rd quarter . Every 30 day investigator measure hemoglobin , hematocrit iron serum assess course treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Substitution Normal Levels Iron Hemoglobin Pregnant Women With Iron Supplement
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age equal 18 year 2 . Registration consent 3 . Have complete 12h week pregnancy 4 . Hemoglobin level < 10,5 ptl 5 . Hematocrit < 32 % 1 . Age < 18 year 2 . Absent registration consent 3 . Step pregnancy less 12 week 4 . Coadministration formulation iron oral parenterally 5 . Background liver kirrosis 6 . Background aimosidirosis 7 . Background acquire chronic aimatochromatosis 8 . Aplastic , Hemolytic anemia chronic diseases 9 . Chronic pancreatitis 10 . Subjective renal or/and liver disease 11 . Hypothyroidism yperthyreoeidismos
